title: Rail Navigation: Untapped Area for GNSS Growth
content: Noida, UP -- (SBWIRE) -- 09/08/2015 -- GNSS, which was initially born as a military initiative has now become a technology, used in a wider sector catering to various needs and requirements, such as in vehicle navigation, fleet management, asset tracking, surveying/mapping, public safety, aeronautical, aviation, marine, and consumer GNSS markets. Its market has witnessed colossal growth during the last decade backed by growing competition among countries for regional navigation systems.
